title: Bold unknown (BRP RPG)
content:
Anyone recognize these fonts?

Solved By:

author: Meriba

comments.content:
Num 1: [Serpentine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055408/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Serpentine) vertically stretched with faux-caps  
Num 2: close to [Runic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055408/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Runic) or [Estienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055408/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/estienne), squooshed again
